articles.title: People Seeking Asylum Confined Outside in Appalling Conditions: Findings and Recommendations from a Monitoring Visit to San Diego - United States of America - ReliefWeb
articles.description: Assessment in English on United States of America about Food and Nutrition, Health and more; published on 21 Nov 2023 by WRC
articles.content:
Introduction
Since mid-September 2023, thousands of migrants and people seeking asylum have been forced to wait in what local providers refer to as open-air detention sites (OADS) after entering the… [+4568 chars]
